name: Runner: Seasons
description:
Runner: Seasons

        Runner:  Seasons is a relaxing endless runner with a twist. Play through Spring, Summer, Autumn, and winter.  This experience starts off easy but gradually builds up in difficulty eventually becoming a difficult, but possible, game. Aim for high scores!

Features
  •    Soundtrack
  •    High Scores 
  •    Seasons 
  •    Touch Controls
Seasons change as you play
